oai_dc:dc.dc:title: List of Confederate mules and stores turned over to US quartermaster
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lt. J. Wood Coleman, Wade's (MS) Battery, CSA listed items turned over to Lt. John B. Pine, USA, at the end of the war. He listed one "worn out" ambulance, two "worn out" harnesses and two "worn out mules." Lt. Pine signed that he received the articles listed.
